attributes.action: I want to start a childcare facility for parents who work nights,
attributes.additional_details: As a single parent and a night shift worker myself I understand the plight of parents who cannot find adequate childcare. Since I hold a valid casino licence I am CRB checked. I live near the hospital where I regularly talk with other parents suffering the same .
attributes.background: Workers across countless sections work nights, and that means either a live in nanny, relative (who won't qualify for funds) or simply not working. There are many empty commercial properties in luton and I would like to turn one into a night childcare nursery for parents working nightshift

rejection.details:
You can find out how to become a childcare provider here:

https://www.gov.uk/childcare-parenting/becoming-a-childcare-provider
